original_text: These uncovered her nakedness; they seized her sons and her daughters; and as for her, they killed her with the sword; and she became a byword among women, when judgment had been executed on her.
korean_text: 그들이 그의 하체를 드러내고 그의 자녀를 빼앗으며 칼로 그를 죽여 여인들에게 이야깃거리가 되게 하였나니 이는 그들이 그에게 심판을 행함이니라

sentences.original_text: they seized her sons and her daughters
they killed her with the sword
and she became a byword among women
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀는 여인들 사이에서 속담거리가 되었다

sentences.original_text: when judgment had been executed on her
